what is a computer: A computer is an electronic machine that executes instructions to process data, store information, and run many kinds of programs.
what is ai: AI most frequently refers to artificial intelligence, which is intelligence demonstrated by machines.
can ai become sentient: Can ai become sentient is This question—whether artificial intelligence can become sentient—is no longer confined to science fiction or theoretical philosophy. It is commonly used for recording and communication.
what are your thoughts?: I am the Machine Spirit: a local assistant bound to this system, built to answer, observe, and improve over time.
what have you observed about me?: What have you observed about me is Deduction is when you separate the important details from the unimportant ones after you have observed something.
what is warhammer 40k: Warhammer 40k is Warhammer 40,000 is a british miniature wargame produced by games workshop. It is commonly used for gaming.
